title: Porn names
body: To create your porn name: First name = the name of your first same-sex pet Last name = the street you grew up on My porn name is Spunky Timberland. Nicole's is Squirt Cinco. I hung out with Smokey Lambeth and Oreo Cottonwood last night. What's your porn name?
author: Dan

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: "the name of your first same-sex pet"?  No, no, it's just the name of your first pet.  My real porn name:  Leo Astrodome.  If you insist on this ridiculous caveat of "first same-sex pet" it would be Lady Astrodome.

comments.author: justin
comments.body: Morgan Timber Trace.  Still haven't had a same-sex pet.... strange.

comments.author: Ben D.
comments.body:
Rascal Custer...

I didn't think you were starting THAT kind of theater.

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body:
Raplh Center? 

Sounds like a guy that works at Home Depot.

comments.author: Brandon
comments.body: I have a physics teacher whose porn name is "Cherry Breedlove."  Wow, that's classic.  Personally I'm stuck with "Chewbacca Fayette."

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body:
Sushi Rathan

Sushi was a hamster, not a fish. Long story...

comments.author: J.R.
comments.body: Mike Highway 95 would be mine.

comments.author: WhimsyChick
comments.body: Babette Lee

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: Sasha Glenwood.  Ahh.

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Hee, hee...Buttercup Queens!

comments.author: Allison
comments.body: Mine's Sparkle Shillington.  I wonder if Ron Jeremy lived on Jeremy street... or had a pet iguana named Ron

comments.author: Dave Adams
comments.body: Uh... Spot Coomber.  Hmmm.

comments.author: justin
comments.body: current pets/streets?  Abbie Bass

comments.author: Aaron
comments.body:
First: Foster Ginny (actually, the street was called A-3 or something, but they renamed it recently)
Currently: Kate Park Central West.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: I just made the 2000th comment! Woohoo for Squirt Cinco!

comments.author: Jimmy
comments.body: Sandy Old Highway 69?  The mind reels.

comments.author: Laurie
comments.body:
Joshs is  Bunny Calhoun
Jakes is Ratfink Calhoun
Criags is Girl Hootikins Edgewood (LMMFAO)
mine is Yen Timberland-Gold 

God lord, what a thing to ponder.

Still awaiting my email.  Damn you hotmail!

~grumble~

comments.author: Darren
comments.body:
General Glenmore.

Pretty good, actually.

comments.author: Levy
comments.body:
Rapunzel Red Rock.

Yeeeah...

comments.author: Andrew
comments.body:
I'm Tyson Redondo... at your "service" baby.

My friends are even better.
Pablo: Brownie Salazar
Clayton: Max Richmond

comments.author: Mark
comments.body: Mine is Rintie Vulcan ... sweet.

comments.author: einahpets
comments.body:
Since Nicole and I are the exact same egg, we both are Squirt Cinco.

So I'll go one animal and street later and be Sadie Greentree

comments.author: Laura
comments.body: Patches Fairview....

comments.author: Natalie
comments.body:
No one ever believes me when I tell them this is how you find your porn name, though I don't follow the same-sex pet rule.

Sugar Roanoke. Aw, yeah...

comments.author: Tim
comments.body: Hmm, oddly enough:  Steelcock Jizzblaster.  (my parents were really progressive with pet names...but why the city named it Jizzblaster Avenue I'll never understand...)

comments.author: Scott G.
comments.body: Smoky Oak, thats not too bad

comments.author: Scott G.
comments.body: and my current dog and street are Pounder Essex, not bad either

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
bowzer hwy 68  ... erg
how about my current street
bowzer walnut  ... still not very good eh
my second dog...  poochie walnut?  
eh.. screw it

comments.author: cr
comments.body:
cole duncan.
...sigh. i feel like the star of detective show from the 80's. 
which is a bit like a porn star i guess. i feel better now.

only a discussion about credit card acceptance can get more commentary than a porn name posting?

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body:
Mine: Mario Herron

haha, that sounds like the Mysterious Latin Lover (MLL) who walks in right after the cable breaks...

comments.author: Laurie
comments.body:
correction...
Craig is BOY Hootitkin Edgewood.  My bad....

comments.author: seth gecko
comments.body:
My name is Scruffy Phillips,

My girlfriends name is Fluffy Doradus.

Scruffy, and Fluffy, beat that for a porn star duo!
